TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Perhaps one might ask why the <color=lightblue>Ash Twin Project</color> is necessary at all, given that my clan is able to access the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>'s sixth location. Right now, we are extrodinarily close to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>.

SOLANUM: Unfortunately, for reasons that are not clear to us, accessing the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> via the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> appaers to be impossible. Simply leaping off into the atmosphere above will merely lead one back to the moon's Timber Hearth state.

SOLANUM: Furthermore, while on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> in any of its locations, tracking and communications technology breaks down completely. Despite standing right here, so close to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>, there is no way to determine my position relative to anything else in the solar system, and thus, no way to find the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>.
SOLANUM: It is immensely frustrating, I must admit.
